        public Builder()

    • Method Detail

      • setStorage

        public Stand.Builder setStorage(StandStorage storage)
        Sets an instance of StandStorage to be used to persist the latest aggregate states.

        If no storage is assigned, in-memory storage will be used.

        Parameters:
        storage - an instance of StandStorage
        Returns:
        this instance of Builder

      • getCallbackExecutor

        public java.util.concurrent.Executor getCallbackExecutor()

      • setCallbackExecutor

        public Stand.Builder setCallbackExecutor(java.util.concurrent.Executor callbackExecutor)
        Sets an Executor to be used for executing callback methods.

        If the Executor is not set, directExecutor() will be used.

        Parameters:
        callbackExecutor - the instance of Executor
        Returns:
        this instance of Builder

      • getStorage

        public StandStorage getStorage()
